newsitem.title: USA: SnyderCapital buys more Inter-City shrs.
newsitem.headline: SnyderCapital buys more Inter-City shrs.

text.p: SnyderCapital Corp said Tuesday it had bought an additional 3.98 million common shares in Inter-City Products Corp in a private transaction.
SnyderCapital said the affiliate that made the purchase, Ravine Partners Ltd, will come to own 7.89 million shares or 20 percent of the Toronto company.
"We have increased our stake in ICP because we believe ICP's management team will continue the momentum of the past 15 months and regain market share lost over the last five years," it said.
Inter-City Products makes heating and air conditioning systems for homes.
SnyderCapital is a private investment firm.
